summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue Southwest from West Edmunds Street to West Hanford Street; West Edmunds Street, from 45th Avenue Southwest to 47th Avenue Southwest; West Alaska Street, from California Avenue to 49th Avenue Southwest; West Genesee Street from California Avenue to 48th Avenue Southwest; West Dakota Street, from California Avenue to 52nd Avenue Southwest; West Andover Street, from California Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest; West Charlestown Street, from California Avenue to 55th Avenue Southwest; West Spokane Street, from California Avenue to 45th Avenue Southwest; West Hinds Street from California Avenue to 51st Avenue Southwest; West Hanford Street, from California Avenue to 45th Avenue Southwest; and 44th Avenue Southwest, from West Hinds Street to West Hanford Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2776 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
